item.description:
arturbackdeluca [at] gmail [dot] com

I am a graduate student in Artificial Intelligence and Robotics at the University of Rome. But I am currently pursuing research programs involving the problems of Statistical Learning and optimization within (but not restricted to) Deep Learning.

Please feel free to reach me within any of the digital medium available here. I currently live in Rome but I'm originally from Brazil. My favorite activities are listening to unfamiliar genres of music and running, although usually not at the same time ðŸ˜ƒ.
